import React, {useRef} from 'react' import {Container} from '@material-ui/core' import SlickSlider from 'react-slick' import {settings} from './sliderSettings' import {SliderArrow} from "../../../elements/slider_arrow/SliderArrow"; import {useStyles} from './useStyles' export const MainSlider = () => { const slider = useRef({ slickNext() {}, slickPrev() {} }); const next = () => slider.current.slickNext(); const previous = () => slider.current.slickPrev(); const classes = useStyles(); return (
) };
